    • displayLeaderBrd

      public void displayLeaderBrd()
      Sets the display of the leaderboard. The leaderboard displays the top 5 users with the most wins. A user must have an account to be displayed on the leaderboard.

    • displayTutorial

      public void displayTutorial()
      Sets the display for the tutorial page. Explains to the user how to play Wordle.

    • changeLighting

      public void changeLighting()
      Changes the stylesheet attached to the scene based on the lighting button
